import React from 'react'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import FileUpload from './FileUpload'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; const Submit = () => { return (

Submit a design!

If you have an open source design to contribute to the makerspace, please submit it here!

Design Name Category Description Proof of Certification To be certified on Resource 19, a design has to provide proof of approval by one of the following institutions: CDC, ECDC, FDA, NIH, or WHO. Designs approved by individual research institiutions such as Universities or others may also be approved on a case by case basis Please provide proof of approval below in the form of a link. Would you like to submit your design for certification? Materials Tools Required Links (Links separated by commas) Images (JPG, PNG) Attachments (PDFs, CAD files, etc.) Give credit where credit is due. Who made this design possible?
); }; const style = { BodyContent: { margin: '0 10% 3rem 10%', }, HeaderSection: { background: '#EBF0F3', padding: '1rem 10%', }, Header1: { fontSize: '42px', color: '#3B628B', margin: '.3rem 0 0 0', }, Subtitle: { fontSize: '24px', fontWeight: '300', color: '#3B628B', paddingTop: '0.8rem', marginBottom: '0', }, FormHeader: { fontSize: '20px', fontWeight: '400', margin: '1rem 0 0.2rem 0', }, FormSubtitle: { fontSize: '16px', fontWeight: '300', marginBottom: '0.4rem', }, Button: { border: '1px solid #3B628B', padding: '0.5rem 3.5rem', maxWidth: '90%', background: 'transparent', fontSize: '24px', color: '#7A98AF', }, }; export default Submit;
